mdRecord.dcterms:description: Petition for free navigation of all navigable waters and water courses falling into the Bay of Mexico from territories of U.S. and passing through Spanish dominions; settlement now can receive only trades licensed by Spanish government. Signed: William Gordon Formans, Speaker of the House of Representatives, and Samuel Sidney Mahon, clerk.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1803 March 12, Mississippi Territory to Thomas Jefferson, [Washington D.C.].
